availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Tiberius R. Matthews (Muhlenberg County, Kentucky, merchant.)

body.p: Muhlenberg County, Kentucky, merchant. Tennessee native. Married to Mary Eliza Crolius Matthews in Muhlenberg County, Kentucky, on January 15, 1847. Merchant in Muhlenberg County in 1850. Owned nine enslaved persons in Muhlenberg County in 1850. Farmer in Muhlenberg County in 1860. Owned fourteen enslaved persons in Muhlenberg County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Muhlenberg County, Subdivision 2, p. 255A.
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Muhlenberg County, Subdivision 2, p. 137.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Agricultural Schedules, Kentucky, Muhlenberg County, District 2, p. 11.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Agricultural Schedules, Kentucky, Muhlenberg County, District 1, p. 94A
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Muhlenberg County, District 2, p. 97A.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Muhlenberg County Marriages, Film 000557316, p. 308.
Kentucky, Wills and Probate Records, 1774-1989, Kentucky County, District, and Probate Courts, Muhlenberg County Wills, vol. 2-3, 1814-1877, p. 401 .
"T.R. Matthews (Unknown-1866)," Find A Grave, Memorial 36741171, accessed September 17, 2022, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/36741171.
